issues.description: The problem statement requires the 'name' attribute in the Animal class to use StringBuilder for efficient string manipulations, but the solution implements it as a String, which contradicts the specified type and could mislead students if they reference the solution or confuse them about the intended design.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the solution repository to declare the 'name' attribute in Animal.java as StringBuilder instead of String to align with the problem statement, ensuring students are not confused about the required data type.

issues.description: The singFarmSongVerse method in the template repository has a commented-out parameter (/*Animal animal*/), effectively lacking the required parameter, while the problem statement and solution specify it should accept an Animal parameter, potentially causing students to implement an incorrect method signature based on the template.
issues.suggested_fix: Uncomment and properly declare the Animal parameter in the singFarmSongVerse method in the template repository to match the problem statement, helping students understand the correct signature without confusion.
